explanation: [0-0] A muscular man with a bare upper body stands in an orchard, wearing dark jeans. He holds two apples in his right hand and one apple in his left hand, holding it in front of his chest. His expression is focused, and he's looking straight ahead. Many apple trees can be seen around him, laden with ripe red apples. Some fallen apples lie on the ground.

[0-2] The shirtless man raises his left hand and takes a bite of the apple. The scene then cuts to a woman with blue-green hair and a pink dress. She has black nail polish and wears two large silver earrings and a nose ring. She stands behind a white railing in a pavilion, arms resting on the railing, looking straight ahead. She then leans forward with her mouth wide open, looking surprised.

[2-5] The scene switches back to the orchard, where the shirtless man reaches out his left hand to pick an apple. The white text "deusesdabeleza" appears at the top of the screen. The scene cuts back to the woman in the pink dress, who becomes more excited, opening her arms, widening her eyes, and looking straight ahead. She then waves her hands continuously. The scene changes back to the orchard, where the shirtless man, after picking the apple, turns to the right, wipes the apple on his pants with his left hand.
